issue.title: [CF 612] LUA Errors on /tmw command
issue.body:
I get this LUA errors when I write the /tmw command. Looks like the problems TellMeWhen is having have relations with other addons, because when I load some addons like PlateBuffs TellMeWhen stops working.

Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:5582: attempt to index field 'db' (a nil value)
Time: 09/13/12 22:03:03
Count: 1
Stack: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:5582: in function `LockToggle'

[C]: in function `ChatEdit_ParseText'

Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4091: in function `ChatEdit_OnEnterPressed'
[string "*:OnEnterPressed"]:1: in function <[string "*:OnEnterPressed"]:1>

comments.body:
Still unable to reproduce this, unfortunately. Even with TMW v6.0.2 and http://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/info21377-PlateBuff-Mop.html as the only addons enabled, no issues arise.

Give v6.0.3 a shot and see if it fixes the issue.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
